sentences.english: Year of the Sheep? I'm betting it all on the St. Louis Rams this season.
sentences.chinese: 羊年？那我這一賽季全賭聖路易斯公羊隊上了。

sentences.english: Therefore, during the Year of the Goat, as a painter in the painting are many topics.
sentences.chinese: 故每逢羊年，畫家中以此爲題材作畫者甚多。

sentences.english: Every goat year, waves of pilgrims come to the Holy Lake. It is really an exceptionally grand occasion.
sentences.chinese: 每逢羊年轉湖的朝聖者人流如潮，盛況空前。

sentences.english: This film is released on the Chinese mainland in the Year of the Sheep.
sentences.chinese: 該片在中國大陸上映的時期正值羊年。

sentences.english: People who was born in the Year of Sheep, known as the most kind-hearted giver.
sentences.chinese: 出生於羊年的人，被譽爲最善良的施捨者。

definition: Year of the Ox or Bull (e.g. 2009)
year of one's birth sign, according to the cycle of 12 animals of the earthly branches 地支[di4 zhi1]
colloquial term for 生肖[sheng1 xiao4] the animals associated with the years of a 12-year cycle
birth year as designated by animal symbols (mouse, ox, tiger etc)
one of the twelve animals symbolic of the earthly branches 地支[di4 zhi1]/animal from the Chinese zodiac
